title: On the Fundamental Eigenvalues gap of Sturm-Liouville Operators
authors: Mohammed Ahrami, Zakaria El Allali, and Evans M. Harrell II
abstract:
We use methods of direct optimization as in [9] to find the minimizers of the
fundamental gap of Sturm-Liouville operators on an interval, under the
constraint that the potential is of single-well form and that the weight
function is of single-barrier form, and under similar constraints expressed in
terms of convexity.
